txt.en: Collect mushrooms from the caves where the dwarves of Thorin's Hall are making Hard Tack or collect a crate from the nearby larder and deliver the items to the cook station in the main area.
Deliver mushrooms to the cook's station
Deliver mushrooms to the cook's station
Deliver a mushroom crate to the cook's station
Deliver the mushrooms you gathered to the cook's station in the main area.
Deliver the mushroom crate to the cooks station
Deliver the mushrooms to the cook's station
Collect a crate of mushrooms from the larder
Hard Tack at Thorin's Hall has ended
You picked up a crate of mushrooms
Mushrooms from within the cave are needed to make the dishes that help the crafting of hard tack along. Collect a crate from the larder or a bundle from the surrounding cave.
Collect deep mushrooms from around the cave ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
You picked up a crate of mushrooms

'You're neither cook nor prospector, but still you can help the dwarves of Thorin's Hall. Excellent. Excellent!

'Mushrooms! The cooks need mushrooms. Fetch a crate from the larder or gather them up from around the cave and deliver them to the cook station in the main room.

'Hurry, now!'
Collect a crate of mushrooms from the larder
